subject: Football
Television
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Brookshier, who helped lead Philadelphia to the 1960 N.F.L. championship, later teamed with Pat Summerall as CBS’s No. 1 pro football broadcasting duo.
snippet: Brookshier, who helped lead Philadelphia to the 1960 N.F.L. championship, later teamed with Pat Summerall as CBS’s No. 1 pro football broadcasting duo.
